<script id="suggResult" type="text/x-jquery-tmpl">
  <li data-link="{{= url}}">
            <a href="{{= url}}" onclick="moreurl(this, {from:'book_search_sugg', query:'{{= keyword }}', subject_id:'{{= id}}', i: '{{= index}}', type: '{{= type}}'})">
            <img src="{{= pic}}" width="40" />
            <div>
                <em>{{= title}}</em>
                {{if year}}
                    <span>{{= year}}</span>
                {{/if}}
                <p>
                {{if type == "b"}}
                    {{= author_name}}
                {{else type == "a" }}
                    {{if en_name}}
                        {{= en_name}}
                    {{/if}}
                {{/if}}
                 </p>
            </div>
        </a>
        </li>
  </script>
